summary.span: 表示 中的选项卡。

span.span: Represents a tab in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 来组织 中相关的命令组。You use a to organize related groups of commands in a . 承载一个或多个 实例。The hosts one or more instances. 然后， 承载表示应用程序命令的控件。A then hosts controls that represent application commands. 以下列表显示了 中的典型元素层次结构。The following list shows the typical hierarchy of elements in a . - - - - , , , , , , , , - , , , , - ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个简单的功能区选项卡的标记。The following example shows the markup for a simple ribbon tab. [!code-xaml[Ribbon_Snippets#RibbonTabDefault](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ribbon_snippets/cs/mainwindow.xaml#ribbontabdefault)]

span.span: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 *"上下文" 选项卡*可以显示仅在特定上下文中相关的命令组。You use a *contextual tab* to display groups of commands that are relevant only in a particular context. 上下文选项卡组根据指定的条件显示或隐藏。Contextual tab groups are shown or hidden based on specified criteria. 例如，检测到 tablet 输入时可能会显示 "墨迹工具" 选项卡组，或者在选择图像对象时可能会显示 "图片工具" 选项卡组。For example, an Ink Tools tab group might be shown when tablet input is detected, or a Picture Tools tab group might be shown when an Image object is selected. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了 "**墨迹工具**" 上下文选项卡组中的 命名**笔**。The following example shows a named **Pens** that is in the **Ink Tools** contextual tab group. ```xaml                              ```

value.span: 已注册的默认值为 。

span.span: The registered default is .

value.span: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅 [Dependency Property Value Precedence（依赖项属性值优先级）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须为1到3个大写字符，不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器"，用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时，键提示会出现在 上。KeyTips appear on the when you press the ALT key. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|
